OrgName.entry: SMILE - THE STUDENT MENTAL ILLNESS LIFELINE

Desc.entry: Provides information and support to students suffering from mental illness or distress, including recent graduates, prospective students or those who are deferring or taking a year out. A voluntary initiative based at Sheffield University, the service can accessed online via the website or through the SMILeSoc society based at the students union (visit the student union website http://www.shef.ac.uk/union/activities-and-sport/societies/other/smile-student-society/ ).

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Please visit the website for details
